title: 参考文献
content:
[1] Martin Fowler. Microservices: a definition of this new architectural term[EB/OL]. https://martinfowler.com/articles/microservices.html, 2014.
[2] Chris Richardson. Pattern: Microservice Architecture[EB/OL]. https://microservices.io/patterns/microservices.html, 2018.
[3] SpringCloud Alibaba开发团队. SpringCloud Alibaba官方文档[EB/OL]. https://github.com/alibaba/spring-cloud-alibaba, 2023.
[4] 翟永超. SpringCloud微服务实战[M]. 北京: 电子工业出版社, 2017.
[5] 杨波. 微服务架构设计模式[M]. 北京: 机械工业出版社, 2019.
[6] 李运华. 从零开始学架构[M]. 北京: 电子工业出版社, 2018.
[7] Eric Brewer. CAP Twelve Years Later: How the "Rules" Have Changed[J]. Computer, 2012, 45(2): 23-29.
[8] Leslie Lamport. The Part-Time Parliament[J]. ACM Transactions on Computer Systems, 1998, 16(2): 133-169.
[9] 阿里巴巴中间件团队. Nacos架构与原理[EB/OL]. https://nacos.io/zh-cn/docs/architecture.html, 2023.
[10] Netflix. Hystrix: Latency and Fault Tolerance Library[EB/OL]. https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix, 2019.
